clues.text: In 1996 Sam & Dave's "Soul Man" was retitled "I'm A" this for the GOP nominee

This Oscar-winning song about an ant moving a rubber tree plant served as JFK's 1960 campaign theme
To consider evidence carefully in the mind, or to put it on a scale
To decide by reasoning; it can also mean to finish
To memorize something exactly is to learn it "by heart" or "by" this, meaning as a result of repeated study
To join different ideas together into a coherent whole; chemists do it to create new compounds
Also a way to collect information, it means to gather bits of grain left by reapers
Title-wise, it preceded "‑topus" as well as "‑nado"
Syfy's take on medieval times is "Dark Relic", set in the Mideast in 1099, at the end of the first of these

"Mega Python vs. Gatoroid"?  Sure, but really, it was Tiffany vs. this '80s pop rival known for "Only In My Dreams"

rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will be two words that are basically the reverse of each other in terms of lettering.)

clues.text:

a sack that might hold a gift

unwanted inbox messages

Your best buddies &
an open hand smack to the face

a save made by a goalie

When Simple Simon meets the pieman, he's headed to this event

Maybe he's a thief because his wind instrument musician father can't make enough to feed the family

clues.text: Ithaca, N.Y. claims to be the home of the first one of these ice cream treats; it included cherry syrup with a cherry on top
